Create 3-Arm ANCOVA Model for Continuous Outcomes

build_model_ancova_cont_3arms.Rd

Creates a 3-arm ANCOVA model with sensible defaults for continuous outcomes. This is a convenience wrapper around build_model_ancova().

Usage

build_model_ancova_cont_3arms(...)

Arguments

...

Additional arguments passed to build_model_ancova(). Can override any of the default parameters.

Value

An object of class "build_model" ready for use with build_design() and power analysis functions.

Details

Default parameters:

  • n_arms = 3

  • contrasts = "contr.treatment"

  • p_alloc = c(1/3, 1/3, 1/3) (equal allocation)

  • intercept = 0

  • b_arm_treat = NULL (must be specified, length 2)

  • b_covariate = NULL (must be specified)

  • sigma = 1

See also

build_model_ancova(), build_model_ancova_cont_2arms()

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Create 3-arm ANCOVA model (must specify effect sizes)
model_3arm <- build_model_ancova_cont_3arms(
  b_arm_treat = c(0.5, 0.7),
  b_covariate = 0.3
)
} # }
